mapper.insert: insert into tblFee (fee_seq, fee_name, feectg_seq, method_seq, adult_seq, fee_time, fee_price) values (seqFee.nextVal, #{fee_name}, #{feectg_seq}, #{method_seq}, #{adult_seq}, #{fee_time}, #{fee_price})
mapper.select: select rownum as rownum1 ,a.fee_seq as fee_seq ,a.fee_name as fee_name1 ,(select b.feectg_name from tblFeectg b where b.feectg_seq = a.feectg_seq) as feectg_name1 ,(select c.method_name from tblmethod c where c.method_seq = a.method_seq) as method_name1 ,(select d.adlut_name from tblAdultctg d where d.adult_seq = a.adult_seq) as adlut_name1 ,a.fee_time as fee_time1 ,a.fee_price as fee_price1 from tblFee a order by fee_seq desc
mapper.update: update tblFee set fee_name = #{fee_name}, feectg_seq = #{feectg_seq}, method_seq = #{method_seq}, adult_seq = #{adult_seq}, fee_time = #{fee_time}, fee_price = #{fee_price} where fee_seq = #{fee_seq}
mapper.select: select rownum as rownum1 ,a.fee_seq as fee_seq ,a.fee_name as fee_name1 ,(select b.feectg_seq from tblFeectg b where b.feectg_seq = a.feectg_seq) as feectg_seq1 ,(select c.method_seq from tblmethod c where c.method_seq = a.method_seq) as method_seq1 ,(select d.adult_seq from tblAdultctg d where d.adult_seq = a.adult_seq) as adult_seq1 ,a.fee_time as fee_time1 ,a.fee_price as fee_price1 from tblFee a where fee_seq = #{fee_seq}
